import React, {Component} from 'react'; class Menuitem extends Component{ render(){ return(

  • Meat PieSPECIAL

    N

    1 box

  • Chocolate Cake

    N8000

    10 inches moist chocolate special perfect for birthdays and home party

  • Cup Cakes

    6 - N3500

    Enjoy discount as make order for more

  • Luxury Protein Platter

    N15000

    Product description goes here

  • Pastries

    N

    Product description goes here

  • Asun

    N

    Product description goes here

  • Dodo Skewer with Pepper

    N0.00

    Product description goes here

  • MOSA BALLs

    N0.00

    Product description goes here

  • Potato Fries

    N0.00

    Product description goes here

  • Doughnuts

    N0.00

    Product description goes here

) } } export default Menuitem;
